items.message: Flooding is possible in this area. Monitor local water levels and weather conditions. Avoid using low lying footpaths or entering areas prone to flooding. Start acting on your flood plan if you have one. Environment Agency Flood Warning Officers set the river or tidal levels that have triggered this message. During industrial action this message has been automatically issued based on rising river or tidal levels.

items.description: River Thames for the Abingdon area
items.message:
This Flood Alert has been removed. 
River levels have now fallen below the flood risk threshold and continue to slowly fall. The forecast is for a predominantly dry day today (09/04/2023) with showers developing tomorrow afternoon. 
We continue to monitor the situation and will re-issue this alert if necessary.
Please remain safe and aware of your local surroundings and avoid contact with standing water that may remain on the floodplain.
